name: Erib_Kurrugh
content:
Erib Kurrugh was a male Trandoshan criminal who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was one of the founders of the Sand Splitters, a criminal organization on Tatooine, along with Saul Rouse. During this time, he operated out of the Sand Splitter Cave on Tatooine. In 1 ABY, the Sand Splitters infiltrated Jabba's Palace and stole from Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Saul Rouse and Erib Kurrugh were killed by Jabba's henchmen sent by Ree-Yees.
Erib Kurrugh appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Erib Kurrugh was added to the game as part of the revamped "Jabba's Theme Park," released with the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
